kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent: 1. Do you happen to have any [content type scopes](https://docs.kentico.com/x/limit_the_pages_users_can_create_xp) defined that might be restricting the pages you are allowed to create under the page tree root? 2. Did you [register your page template](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/developers-and-admins/development/builders/page-builder/page-templates-for-page-builder#register-page-templates) for the content type of the page you are trying to create? 3. Did you specify the given content type in the `PageBuilderOptions.ContentTypeNames` property when [configuring the Page Builder globally](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/developers-and-admins/development/builders/page-builder#enable-the-page-builder-feature)?
